resources.string:
C o l i b r i © 2014–2016

Original concept and maintenance: Louis DURAND
louis.dur54@gmail.com

Application launched during the development project in Telecom Bretagne by the following students:
Durand Louis, Guyard Valentin, Jacquemod Laura et Thiam Mariam

	We wanted to thank our tutor, Gwenaël Brunet, information and network technician at the department Image and Information Analysis.

\u0009You are a hummingbird in a field full of menhirs in Brittany and you have to taste all the flowers covering the meadow.\n\nYou can only fly straight and change direction when you are in front of an obstacle (menhir, cow or edge).

\u0009It\'s up to you to discover the different elements of the game along your progression, like the magical flowers, the dynamites, the cows, the cats and the rainbows! (You unlock them in the Campaign.)
\u0009Start with some Campaign levels, then you could try the Multiplayer Challenges to confront your friends or other players from around the world!\n\nHave fun!!
\u0009The length as well as the number of additional elements increases the difficulty but also the amount of experience earned!
You didn\'t unlock the next level yet!
You didn\'t unlock the solution of this level yet!
\u21AA This level and your results will be sent to your opponent.
Do you wish to abandon by forfeit?
Awesome! You beat the Campaign mode!!
Congratulations!\nHave you tried the Random Levels and the Multiplayer Challenges yet? ;)
Please enter your nickname and your password:
Error 500: something went wrong at server end.
Unknown error. Are you connected to Internet?
Oops, error on the servor side!
This username is already taken.\nTry something else!
Registering to Google Cloud Messaging service…
The deadline has been surpassed.\nConnect to the network and refresh!
Another participant in the challenge %1$s has already submitted a new level. Yours has been therefore discarded.
Your last participation to the challenge %1$s has been submitted after the deadline!
CHEATER spotted! Seems like you used two devices to solve one level of the challenge "%1$s"… You get a 10000 exp penalty! Don\'t do that again ;)
You must be connected to register for multiplayer mode!

No challenge yet!

Create a new challenge with
the button on the left.
%1$s finished the challenge. Check the results!
The challenge expired. Check the results!
Do you really wish to cancel your participation to the challenge \"%1$s\" and remove it from your list?
You must be connected to view the rankings!
Do you want to disconnect from this account?\nYou won\'t loose any data and you can reconnect later with your name and password.
This nickname is not registered. Switch to "Register" if you want to register this name.
You killed the application during a challenge: Forfeit.
%1$s of experience earned offline will be synchronized with this account!
\u0009* In case of lost password. No commercial use.
\u0009(i) You will receive an e-mail at the address you specified when creating the account. Please follow the instructions in it then.
Already sent less than a day ago!\nCheck your mails! ;) (Possibly in SPAM)
Sending problem! Did you provide a valid address??
Be patient! Everybody has not played this match yet. ;)
You have %1$d new challenges to solve!
The results of %1$d challenges are available!
You have to update Colibri to the latest version!
